short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate and personalize your streaming journey, save time and money.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watch what you want, automatically skip what you don't. Take control of your viewing experience with CleanVid, the next generation Chrome extension designed to elevate and personalize your streaming journey. Are you tired of unexpected jump scares, explicit content, or those annoying breaks in the middle of your favorite video? CleanVid is here to help! Watch content from your favorite streaming service while automatically skipping the parts you don't want to see. You also can mute or blur out parts of a video, movie, or series based on your preferences. Download now and start watching only the content you want to see.

We use ClerkJs for our authenciate platform, ClerkJs is a powerful authentication tool that allows developers to easily integrate user authentication into their applications.
